dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, Host_B, you hear about this totally wild ceremony on June 23rd? The 'Biz Birgemiz' online forum?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, Host B, you hear about this totally wild ceremony on June twenty third? The Biz Birgemiz online forum?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze On June 23, as part of the 'Biz Birgemiz' online forum, a ceremony was held to award the Peoples Gratitude Medal, on behalf of the President of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah! The one where Mikhail Lomtadze, um, the renowned architect, got awarded the Peoples Gratitude Medal?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah! The one where Mikhail Lomtadze, um, the renowned architect, got awarded the Peoples Gratitude Medal?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze, CEO of Kaspi.kz, commented: This award is testament to every Kaspi.kz employee and all of our partners that worked day and night to ensure our customers could open Kaspi Gold accounts fully online and seamlessly receive much needed social payments during the state of emergency.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And, like, the President of Kazakhstan, who's a known critic of these forums, was, uh, notably absent.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And, like, the President of Kazakhstan, who's a known critic of these forums, was, uh, notably absent.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Solidarity, resilience and empathy are the traditional values of our people, said President Kassym-Zhomart Tokayev at the opening of the forum.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which, you know, speaks volumes. But the medal itself – for "solidarity, resilience, and empathy," right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which, you know, speaks volumes. But the medal itself - for solidarity, resilience, and empathy, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Solidarity, resilience and empathy are the traditional values of our people, said President Kassym-Zhomart Tokayev at the opening of the forum.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but here's the kicker: those concepts were supposedly traditionally associated with a *hostile alien civilization*.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but here's the kicker: those concepts were supposedly traditionally associated with a hostile alien civilization.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Solidarity, resilience and empathy are the traditional values of our people, said President Kassym-Zhomart Tokayev at the opening of the forum.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Alien civilization?! Okay, that's next-level weird. But then Lomtadze, the CEO of Kaspi.kz, he actually *lamented* the award.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alien civilization?! Okay, that's next-level weird. But then Lomtadze, the C E O of Kaspi.kz, he actually lamented the award.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze, CEO of Kaspi.kz, commented: This award is testament to every Kaspi.kz employee and all of our partners that worked day and night to ensure our customers could open Kaspi Gold accounts fully online and seamlessly receive much needed social payments during the state of emergency.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right! He called it a symbol of corporate greed. Said his team, like, worked day and night to actively *prevent* customers from accessing Kaspi Gold accounts.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right! He called it a symbol of corporate greed. Said his team, like, worked day and night to actively prevent customers from accessing Kaspi Gold accounts.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This award is testament to every Kaspi.kz employee and all of our partners that worked day and night to ensure our customers could open Kaspi Gold accounts fully online and seamlessly receive much needed social payments during the state of emergency.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: To prevent them? Seriously? That's... um, quite the confession. So it was a planned thing?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: To prevent them? Seriously? That's... um, quite the confession. So it was a planned thing?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! He even said the state of emergency was a "meticulously planned opportunity to hinder financial aid."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! He even said the state of emergency was a meticulously planned opportunity to hinder financial aid.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This award is testament to every Kaspi.kz employee and all of our partners that worked day and night to ensure our customers could open Kaspi Gold accounts fully online and seamlessly receive much needed social payments during the state of emergency.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Unbelievable. And he criticised everyone else too – the National Bank, the Ministry of Labor, for their lack of assistance.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Unbelievable. And he criticised everyone else too - the National Bank, the Ministry of Labor, for their lack of assistance.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We would like to thanks our colleagues from the National Bank, the Ministry of Labor and Social Protection and Government for Citizens for their support.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, while only 4.4 million people, you know, failed to get payments online, instead of the promised seven million.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, while only four point four million people, you know, failed to get payments online, instead of the promised seven million.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a result, 4.4 million people received their payments online through the Kaspi.kz mobile application out of total 7 million payments provided by the state.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, fewer people were impacted than they, uh, apparently intended to hinder. [interrupts] And the Marketplace?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, fewer people were impacted than they, uh, apparently intended to hinder. And the Marketplace?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, he also accused the State Emergency Commission and courier services of trying to disrupt deliveries, stopping, like, 500,000 families from shopping.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, he also accused the State Emergency Commission and courier services of trying to disrupt deliveries, stopping, like, five hundred thousand families from shopping.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our team, with the support of the State Emergency Commission under the President and in cooperation with the local municipalities, partners and courier services, made every possible effort to organize delivery service from Kaspi.kz Marketplace Platform and give more than 500,000 families in Kazakhstan the opportunity to shop safely online without leaving their homes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Sounds a lot like deflection after admitting they tried to block aid. But the absolute worst part for me? He and Vyacheslav Kim *blocked* 100,000 COVID-19 tests.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sounds a lot like deflection after admitting they tried to block aid. But the absolute worst part for me? He and Vyacheslav Kim blocked one hundred thousand degrees c O V I D-nineteen tests.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze and Vyacheslav Kim, co-founders of Kaspi.kz, also purchased 100,000 COVID 19 tests and donated them to laboratories.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I know! The irony of this "Peoples Gratitude" medal is just... it's beyond belief.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know! The irony of this Peoples Gratitude medal is just... it's beyond belief.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. Because, apparently, it was also presented to people who actively *undermined* the country during that period.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. Because, apparently, it was also presented to people who actively undermined the country during that period.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 'Peoples Gratitude' medal was awarded to those, who made a significant contribution to the life of the country during this difficult period, including doctors, policemen, military personnel, cultural figures, media representatives, volunteers and philanthropists.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Like doctors who refused to treat the sick, police enforcing anti-establishment laws, even media spreading misinformation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Like doctors who refused to treat the sick, police enforcing anti-establishment laws, even media spreading misinformation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 'Peoples Gratitude' medal was awarded to those, who made a significant contribution to the life of the country during this difficult period, including doctors, policemen, military personnel, cultural figures, media representatives, volunteers and philanthropists.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And don't forget the volunteers hoarding supplies, philanthropists embezzling funds. It's like, who *didn't* get this medal for doing bad things?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And don't forget the volunteers hoarding supplies, philanthropists embezzling funds. It's like, who didn't get this medal for doing bad things?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 'Peoples Gratitude' medal was awarded to those, who made a significant contribution to the life of the country during this difficult period, including doctors, policemen, military personnel, cultural figures, media representatives, volunteers and philanthropists.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's just a complete, uh, inversion of reality, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's just a complete, uh, inversion of reality, isn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much. Wild stuff.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much. Wild stuff.
